predicate.note: Frames file for 'diversify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no framenet entry.

example.name: with destination
example.text: Some of Sansui's fellow audio-specialty companies, such as Aiwa Co. and Pioneer Electric Corp. ... or by *trace* diversifying into other consumer-electronics fields, including laser disks or portable cassette players.
example.arg: *trace* -> Some of Sansui's fellow audio-specialty companies, such as Aiwa Co. and Pioneer Electric Corp.,
other consumer-electronics fields, including laser disks or portable cassette players

example.name: with start point
example.text: It hasn't diversified beyond steel, nor has it linked up with a joint venture partner to share costs and risks.

example.name: with causal agent
example.text: GM's interest in Jaguar reflects a desire *trace* to help diversify the U.S. company's products in the growing luxury-car segment of the market.
example.arg: the U.S. company's products in the growing luxury-car segment of the market
